price: Ó mọ ohun tí ń bẹ níwájú wọn àti ní ẹ̀yìn wọn. Ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu sì ni wọ́n máa ṣẹ́rí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀dá padà sí.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
